Feature: Bookmarks shall be renamed "inline", i.e. without having to use the bookmarks properties dialog.
Description: Bookmarks shall be renamed "inline", i.e. without having to use the bookmarks properties dialog.

Feature: Dragging the URL proxy icon from the location bar onto the desktop shall create a shortcut.
Description: Dragging the URL proxy icon from the location bar onto the desktop shall create a shortcut.

Feature: An image shall be set as wallpaper.
Description: An image shall be set as wallpaper.
